tools:
[{"name": "alerts_active_zone_zoneid_for_national_weather_service", "description": "A list of active alerts by zone id. The ATOM format returns items in CAP-ATOM. Example: /alerts/active/zone/ILZ081", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"zoneid": {"type": "string", "description": "zoneId: a valid zone, see list in counts endpoint", "enum": null, "items": null}}, "required": ["zoneid"]}, "category": "national_weather_service"}, {"name": "points_point_stations_for_national_weather_service", "description": "Stations nearest to a point in order of distance. Example: /points/39.0693,-94.6716/stations", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"point": {"type": "string", "description": "point: EPSG:4326 latitude, EPSG:4326 longitude", "enum": null, "items": null}}, "required": ["point"]}, "category": "national_weather_service"}, {"name": "forecast_weather_api_for_weatherapi_com", "description": "Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"q": {"type": "string", "description": "Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g", "enum": null, "items": null}, "days": {"type": "integer", "description": "Number of days of forecast required.", "enum": null, "items": null}, "dt": {"type": "string", "description": "If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.", "enum": null, "items": null}, "lang": {"type": "string", "description": "Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language", "enum": null, "items": null}}, "required": ["q"]}, "category": "weatherapi_com"}]

messages.content: 根据天气查询结果，北京市目前没有发布天气预警，天气状况良好。

<think>
用户想要查询天气预警信息，需要检查是否有活跃的天气警报。
